ygData.subject: Song (parody): Closet Male
ygData.msgSnippet: It s been a slow day (both at work and on the board, I ve noticed), so I got round to finishing off another song. I thought it was funny how some guys react to
ygData.messageBody:
It's been a slow day (both at work and on the board, I've noticed), so I got
round to finishing off another song.

I thought it was funny how some guys react to the female Wood-Elf
characters. /ooc comments and wolf-whistles abound, but do they really know
who's at the other end of the keyboard...?

When was the last time you heard a female player get all hot and bothered at
the sight of any of the male character models?

To the tune of 'Centerfold' by The J. Geils Band

Does she cast? Does she tank?
Does she run with SoW?
My blonde haired Wood Elf Druid
Always made me lose control.

She was clad in leather
So tight it was a sin
I'd lose myself among the trees
As I ran through Kelethin

Months go by I'm lookin' through Hotmail's directory
I find my EQ hunny, and her real name is Geoffrey!

CHORUS
I can't inhale
I think I'll quit this game and bail
My angel is a closet male
Angel is a closet male
(Repeat)

Laughed and joked and beamed a smile
As we were medding all the while
Sent me *hugs* before she logged
I grinned from ear to ear

We'd go walkin' in Steamfont
To make her mine is what I want
I told my friends of my intent
But they just thought me queer

I found old Geoffrey's webpage
And a section with some pics
Not only was he married
But his kids were 3 and 6!

CHORUS

What burns me, I stop to think
Armour, weapons, she was my Twink
I gave her on the first of Spring
A Silver Rose Engagement Ring

Confronted him the next day
"What's the big idea?"
I challenged him to a duel
But he fairly spanked my rear

I've played this game since Beta 4
I never got involved before
Here's me thinking it was roleplay
Turns out it's his idea of foreplay!

CHORUS

------------
Kyrisha Soerbaird
Bard of the 26th Song
Bertoxxulous
